item.description:
Let's go check out 3 funny comedian's (1 to still be announced).

IF you haven't gotten your ticket ahead of time, don't worry I have reserved table(s) for all of us, we can pay at the door.  IF you have already gotten your ticket, then no worries you are all set.

So far on stage will be:

FREDDIE STONE

● “Master of Boston Props” ● Performed with Martin Lawrence, Steven Wright and Weird Al Yankovic.

HARRISON STEBBINS

● Comedy Central Live Tour ● Dave Attel’s “Insomniac Tour” ● Sam Adams “Best of Boston”  Comedy Competition Winner ● Performed with Dane Cook, Larry the Cable Guy, Steven Wright, Kevin Nealon, Dave Chappelle, Joe Rogan, Anthony Clark and many more!

 

Cost: $ 15.00. When you call for your ticket tell them you are with "THE MEETUP GROUP".           Please put on your RSVP if you have called for your ticket.

Phone # to get your ticket: (978) 388-8700.

Seating: We will be sitting together at the table(s) I have already reserved.

Parking: Plenty of parking in the back of the building.

 

Take a minute now and put the Meetup phone into your phone, that way if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, you already have it in your phone:  978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you in advance for paying your dues!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

Look forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be upstairs, come on in and meet us up there.
item.name: Laughter is contagious....
